name: Successful login with valid credentials

steps.name: Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user is on the products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to cart
Then the cart badge should display "1"
And the cart should contain "Sauce Labs Backpack"
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user is on the products page
When the user adds the following products to cart
Then the cart badge should display "3"
And the cart should contain all added products
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user is on the products page
Given the user has added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to cart
When the user removes "Sauce Labs Backpack" from cart
Then the cart badge should not be visible
And the cart should be empty
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user is on the products page
When the user adds "Sauce Labs Backpack" to cart
And navigates to the cart page
Then the cart should display
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user is on the products page
Given the user has added "Sauce Labs Backpack" to cart
When the user navigates to the cart page
And clicks "Continue Shopping"
Then the user should be on the products page
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user has added the following products to cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And enters the following checkout information
And clicks Continue
And clicks Finish
Then the order confirmation should be displayed
And the confirmation message should contain "Thank you for your order!"
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user has added the following products to cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And enters valid checkout information
And clicks Continue
Then the checkout overview should display
And the payment information should show "SauceCard #31337"
And the shipping information should show "Free Pony Express Delivery!"
And the total should include item total and tax
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user has added the following products to cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And enters checkout information with missing "First Name"
And clicks Continue
Then an error message should be displayed for the missing "First Name"
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user has added the following products to cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And enters checkout information with missing "Last Name"
And clicks Continue
Then an error message should be displayed for the missing "Last Name"
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user has added the following products to cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And enters checkout information with missing "Postal Code"
And clicks Continue
Then an error message should be displayed for the missing "Postal Code"
Given the user is logged in with "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And the user has added the following products to cart
When the user proceeds to checkout
And clicks Cancel
Then the user should be redirected to the cart page
Given the user navigates to the SauceDemo login page
When the user enters "standard_user" and "secret_sauce"
And clicks the login button
Then the user should be redirected to the products page
And the page title should contain "Products"

fullName: User Login: Successful login with valid credentials
